title: ðŸš¨ George Kittle, 49ers agree to record extension for tight end - Emergency Podcast (Football 8/13)
description:
George Kittle will become the highest-paid tight end in NFL history after agreeing to a reported 5-year, $75 million extension with the 49ers. There's been buzz regarding a potential deal all summer and on Thursday, the two sides finally made it happen. To break down the record extension, Will Brinson brings on the Superfriends - Ryan Wilson and John Breech - for full analysis. Why now? How will this signing impact future contracts for notable tight ends like Travis Kelce and Zach Ertz? Will, Ryan and John also offer their thoughts on Kittle's value and expectations for San Francisco's offense in this emergency episode.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
